trans-unit.source: Specifies how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control behaves when the control resizes.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il comportamento di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> in un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> quando il controllo viene ridimensionato.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Questa enumerazione viene utilizzata per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property specifies how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is autosized on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> proprietà specifica come un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> viene ridimensionato automaticamente in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> enumeration and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> enumerazione e come gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire l'esempio, incollare il codice seguente in un form.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il `InitializeStatusBarPanels` metodo nel costruttore del form o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> il metodo di gestione degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is determined by its contents.
trans-unit.target: La larghezza dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> è determinata dal relativo contenuto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> does not change size when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control resizes.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> non variano quando il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> viene ridimensionato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> shares the available space on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> (the space not taken up by other panels whose <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents" />) with other panels that have their <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> property set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring" />.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> condivide lo spazio disponibile nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />, quando tale spazio non sia occupato da altri pannelli la cui proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> è impostata su <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents" />, con altri pannelli la cui proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> è impostata su <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring" />.
